### Longer list of files
```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
directories <- dir('Topics')
files <- c()
for (d in directories){
  cat(paste('\n####', d, "\n"))
  files <- dir(paste('Topics/',d, sep=""))
  for (f in files) {
    if (grepl('.html', f) ) {
      cat(paste(' * [',d, "/", f,']', sep=""))
      cat(paste('(',d, "/", f,')\n', sep=""))
      }
  }
}
```
